name: 9 Smart Animate Examples
description:
Helped create this example file for the launch of Smart Animate (https://www.figma.com/blog/announcing-smart-animate-and-advanced-transitions/)

Included are:

1. An iOS Page Transition
2. An In-line Card Expansion
3. Material Design
4. A Slideshow
5. A Mobile Tab Transition
6. A Swipe to remove Interaction
7. A Map Zoom Effect
8. An Apple Watch Concept
9. An iPad Swipe Effect

Simply press play while viewing any of the pages to see the example in action.

These were made to help make the promo video we shared here:
https://twitter.com/figmadesign/status/1179795593180438543
